thing-type.label: FileToParseThing
thing-type.description: Watches a file and matches a regular expression to each new line. Channels are generated automatically for each matcher group

parameter.name: regEx
parameter.label: RegEx
parameter.description: Regular expression to be applied to each line of the file

parameter.name: matchingGroupTypes
parameter.label: Matching Group Types
parameter.description: Types of matching groups str or num, comma separated list. - number must match the number of the matching groups defined in the RegEx e.g.: str,num,num,str

channel-type.label: matchingGroup Number
channel-type.description: Result of MatchingGroup x, type Number
